title: Thikki Thenarudhu Devathai Lyrics Vu Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Thikki Thenarudhu Devathai  (Junior)
Singers: B.Shruti, ‘Super Singer Junior’ Aajeedh
Movie: Vu
Lyrics: Murugan Manthiram
Music: Abhijith Ramasamy		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Thikki Thenarudhu Devathai
Vetka padudhu oru poomazha, thaanaa
sikki kidakura aambala, naanthaan

Arisi nellulayum, kuthum mullulayum
un mugam vandhu sirikum
andha nilaa thothu pogum
unna paartha indha vazhka pidikudhey

Kattu karumbula thaenthuli
enna mirattudhu un mozhi
neethaan putham pudhusaa pootha
poochedi pola
aala kollurayae, aayul ketkuraye

Nee varum neram kolambum
kedigaaram thanna marakkum
idhayam thudikka silayaa nikkudhey

Anakattu thanni pola nikkura
raathiri pooraam muzhichi kidakuren
Kottum siripula uranji kidakuren
kitta nadakayil kirangi thavikuren
aathaaadi usurellaam ozhugi thudikuren
uravaaga unna kadavul kitta kettu vaanguven

Thikki Thenarudhu Devathai
Vetka padudhu oru poomazha, thaanaa
sikki kidakura aambala, naanthaan

Kattu karumbula thaenthuli
enna mirattudhu un mozhi
neethaan putham pudhusaa pootha
poochedi pola
aala kollurayae, aayul ketkuraye English Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
